'''''The Ruby Guardian''''' is the second book in the [[Scions of Arrabar trilogy]].

{{Quote|''The Ruby Guardian''

''A forbidden alliance solidifies, an army marches, and an ancient society begins to crumble.''

''[[Vambran Matrell|Vambran]] and [[Emriana Matrell|Emriana]] have survived assassination attempts, [[Matrell|family feuds]], arranged marriages, and monster-guarded secrets. But now things are starting to get really dangerous.''

''The Scions of Arrabar''

''Heirs to a legacy of blood and steel struggle for control of a [[Chondath|nation of mercenaries]] at odds with its neighbors and at war with itself.''}}
